summary: Build a Quran ayah audio playback feature so users can press Play and hear recitations, using the free Al Quran Cloud API / Islamic Network CDN MP3 links.
architectural_notes: Use Al Quran Cloud API (api.alquran.cloud) JSON 'audio' field or Islamic Network CDN MP3 format https://cdn.islamic.network/quran/audio/128/{reciter}/{ayahNo}.mp3 for playback (no API key).
known_issues: Play button currently produces no sound for any ayah; audio source/playback not implemented yet.

existing_features.title: Fix the Quran reader audio playback so that pressing the Play button reliably starts audible ayah recitation for all ayahs, using Al Quran Cloud / Islamic Network CDN MP3 URLs (e.g., https://cdn.islamic.network/quran/audio/128/ar.alafasy/{ayahNo}.mp3).
Ensure the ayah-level “Listen” action plays the selected ayah even if audio was not already playing, and does not remain silent due to an unset/empty audio source.

new_feature_requests.summary: Integrate Al Quran Cloud API / Islamic Network CDN ayah audio so Play button fetches/uses MP3 URL (e.g., ar.alafasy) and plays recitations

projectName: Enable ayah audio playback via Al Quran Cloud (Play button should produce sound)
